item.title: Rules command
item.dc:creator: @I_Justin_I I Justin I
item.description:
@I_Justin_I wrote:

Change the command to this

 if (command.startsWith("rules")) {                        
                                sendQuest("@dre@Official Rules", 8144);
                                clearQuestInterface();
                                sendQuest("No asking for staff, all staff positions are earned.", 8147);
                                sendQuest("No flaming or spamming, may result in a mute.", 8148);
                                sendQuest("No scamming / pkpoint trading.", 8149);
                                sendQuest("No advertising any other server or website.", 8150);
                                sendQuest("No multiple-logging in.", 8151);
                                sendQuest("No impersonating any member of staff.", 8152);
                                sendQuest("No absusing any bugs or glitches.", 8153);
                                sendQuest("No autoclickers/macros/bots or hacks.", 8154);
                                sendQuest("Respect all staff members.", 8155);
                                sendQuest("You are allowed to swear but not against staff.", 8156);
                                sendQuest("Don´t spec and run away.", 8157);
                                sendQuest("No duping.", 8158);
                                sendQuest("No crashing/flooding or in any way harm the server.", 8159);
                                sendQuest("Admins are not allowed to PK, only admin vs admin.", 8160);
                                sendQuest("Mods and admins are not allowed to give away items", 8161);
                                sendQuestSomething(8143);
                                showInterface(8134);
                                flushOutStream();
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Rules command
item.dc:creator: @I_C_E I C E
item.description:
@I_C_E wrote:

I tried to make a rule command but I get a error at compile… Please help me
This is the code in Client.java

if (command.startsWith("rules")) { //Made using CDW's Program public void Rules()//Start Of Rules{ sendQuest("@dre@Official Rules", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("No asking for staff, all staff positions are earned.", 8147); sendQuest("No flaming or spamming, may result in a mute.", 8148); sendQuest("No scamming / pkpoint trading.", 8149); sendQuest("No advertising any other server or website.", 8150); sendQuest("No multiple-logging in.", 8151); sendQuest("No impersonating any member of staff.", 8152); sendQuest("No absusing any bugs or glitches.", 8153); sendQuest("No autoclickers/macros/bots or hacks.", 8154); sendQuest("Respect all staff members.", 8155); sendQuest("You are allowed to swear but not against staff.", 8156); sendQuest("Don´t spec and run away.", 8157); sendQuest("No duping.", 8158); sendQuest("No crashing/flooding or in any way harm the server.", 8159); sendQuest("Admins are not allowed to PK, only admin vs admin.", 8160); sendQuest("Mods and admins are not allowed to give away items", 8161); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

And this is my error code when I compile

client.java:8198: illegal start of expression public void Rules()//Start Of Rules{ ^ client.java:8198: illegal start of expression public void Rules()//Start Of Rules{ ^ client.java:8198: ';' expected public void Rules()//Start Of Rules{ ^ 3 errors Finished!
Please help me!

Read full topic
